sentences.en: And that a few deferential protestations would take the edge from her displeasure.
sentences.cn: 只要对她说上几句恭维话,她心中的恼怒就会烟消云散.

sentences.en: Closer to home is the deferential treatment shown to human bodies in medical schools.
sentences.cn: 医科学校恭敬对待尸体的做法更不容易受到批评.

sentences.en: Fei Little Beard , his eyes still on the floor , replied with a string of deferential yeses.
sentences.cn: 费小胡子恭恭敬敬接连答应了几个“是”, 眼睛看在地下.

sentences.en: He is deferential to his superiors.
sentences.cn: 他对他的长官是恭敬的.

sentences.en: He was very deferential. He was not trying to insinuate himself.
sentences.cn: 同时他只是惯于顺从的做这些事,而不是主观行为.

sentences.en: I am deferential and respectful in the presence of artists.
sentences.cn: 我一向恭敬、尊重艺术家.

sentences.en: Not be previous that person insults king, is that person deferential to king later?
sentences.cn: 不是先前那人侮辱大王, 后来那人对大王恭敬 吗 ?

sentences.en: She is always extremely deferential to anyone in authority.
sentences.cn: 她对任何权威人士总是必恭必敬.

sentences.en: Subsequent sections of the chapter explain this more deferential component of the reviewing court's job.
sentences.cn: 本章随后的几节将阐述行使审查的法院校为尊重机关决定的那一部分工作.

sentences.en: Surrounded by deferential students and learned colleagues, Smith felt very proud.
sentences.cn: 身边围聚着态度恭敬的学生和学识渊博的同行, 史密斯感到很自豪.

sentences.en: The formal ones include honorific deferential , and humbling terms, all of them generally universal and systematic.
sentences.cn: 正式称谓分为尊称、敬称、谦称等礼貌称谓, 一般具有共性与系统性.

sentences.en: They like five-star hotels and deferential treatment.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢五星级的宾馆和毕恭毕敬的接待。

trans.tran_en: Someone who is deferential is polite and respectful toward someone else
